name: ScreamZone Jam Game
description:
just uploading the first part of the level.  you can't actually complete it (or die).

still need to finish adding the puzzles in the next rooms if i have time.

Esc to quit (no menu just quits)

controls: WASD to move

J = USE/SHOOT

K= RUN

L = AIM

I= INVENTORY WASD TO NAVIGATE ( EQUIPPED ITEM IN GREEN)
